alfredsnippet.snippet:
This snippets collection is complementary to the Dynamic Placeholders documentation, which you'll find here:
https://www.alfredapp.com/help/features/clipboard/dynamic-placeholders/

Dynamic content makes it possible to include changing content in your snippets, such as the date, time, clipboard contents and more.

Take a look at each snippet's configuration in Alfred's Features > Snippets preferences to see the placeholder text used to paste the examples in this collection.
alfredsnippet.name: 1. Intro to Dynamic Content
